quotes.quote: People are always good company when they are doing what they really enjoy.
Good company and good discourse are the very sinews of virtue.
A man has to live with himself, and he should see to it that he always has good company.
A book is good company. It is full of conversation without loquacity. It comes to your longing with full instruction, but pursues you never.
Good company, lively conversation, and the endearments of friendship fill the mind with great pleasure.
Keep good company, and you shall be of the number.
A man should think less of what he eats and more with whom he eats because no food is so satisfying as good company.
Good company will always be found much less expensive than bad.
Books are good company, in sad times and happy times, for books are people-- people who have managed to stay alive by hiding between the covers of a book.
The shortest way to get anywhere is to have good company.
In good company, the individuals merge their egotism into a social soul exactly co-extensive with the several consciousnesses there present.
Good taste is as tiring as good company.
Roads are long; make them short with a good company!
Always keep good company. Never waste an hour with anyone who doesn't lift you up and encourage you.
It is with a good book as it is with good company.

In good company your thoughts run, in solitude your thought is still ... In talk your mind can be stretched, widened, exhilarated to heights, but it cannot be deepened; you have to deepen it yourself.
Good-breeding is the art of showing men, by external signs, the internal regard we have for them. It arises from good sense, improved by conversing with good company.
Children...will never go astray while they are in good company.
Books are always good company if you have the right sort.
